setting.location: Empty railway station platform with single train waiting in darkness
setting.weather: Cold night with mist rising from tracks, few gas lamps creating pools of yellow light

characters.appearance: Middle-aged man, 40s, disheveled appearance, coat unbuttoned, wild expression of despair
characters.clothing: Dark overcoat hanging open, suit rumpled and wrinkled, no hat, hair unkempt from inner turmoil
characters.position: Standing at edge of railway platform, looking down at steel tracks
characters.action: Contemplating stepping in front of approaching train, wrestling with suicidal thoughts

scene.mainElements: Deserted railway platform with iron rails gleaming in gaslight, locomotive approaching in distance with headlight cutting through darkness, abandoned luggage trolleys and benches
scene.details: Steam and smoke billowing from locomotive chimney, rails vibrating with approaching train, platform clock showing past midnight hour, few scattered railway workers in distance, puddles reflecting gas lamp light, luggage and cargo waiting for departure, cold metal and stone construction emphasizing industrial harshness
scene.background: Railway buildings and signal towers in darkness, city lights visible in distance, star-filled sky above industrial landscape
scene.atmosphere: Moment of absolute despair and contemplation of death, industrial setting emphasizing dehumanizing aspects of modernity, loneliness and isolation in mechanized world, tension between self-destruction and survival instinct, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Wide shot showing solitary figure against vast railway infrastructure
composition.focus: The man poised between life and death at platform edge
composition.depth: Foreground: railway tracks and platform edge, middle: desperate figure, background: approaching locomotive and industrial landscape
